mapper.insert: insert into blog (id, title, profile) select id, ifnull(#{title }, CONCAT(name,'ì˜ Blog')), ifnull(#{profile },'/assets/images/blog-basic.jpg') from user where id = #{id }
mapper.select: select no, name, description, id , (select count(*) from post where category_no = id) as postCount from category where id = #{id } order by no
mapper.insert: insert into category (name, description, id) values (#{name }, #{description }, #{id } )
insert into post (title, contents, reg_date, category_no) values (#{title }, #{contents }, sysdate(), #{categoryNo } )
mapper.select: select no, title, contents, reg_date as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where category_no = #{no } order by no desc
